Ho Chi Minh City is the
only city that has achieved certification as an animal disease-free area
for rabies at the
provincial level with a rabies vaccination rate
above  90 minutes total dog and cat population
This information was
released by the Ho Chi Minh City Center for Disease Control (HCDC)

pet owners to vaccinate
their pets to manage diseases.  Currently,
59 out of 312 communes and towns have
established groups to catch roaming dogs.
The City Department of Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Medicine

million households raising dogs and cats with a total population
of 7 dogs and cats.  6 million dogs and cats The dog and cat raising movement
is growing strongly, especially in
big cities like Ho Chi
Minh City. If not managed, raising dogs and cats
can lead to the risk of spreading a
number of animal-borne diseases.  to humans,
including chicken disease,

A fugitive from a wanted warrant was just
arrested after 8 months of fleeing to
Cambodia. 21-

in  a case of fatal attack
according to police records. Due to a conflict
before June 30, 2023, Son

Son Tinh Co's journey to find the group's reputation. Seeing two of the

Afterwards, the police arrested the subjects

Ninh Thuan province police in coordination with
Ho Chi Minh City authorities

recently the form of payment and money transfer

Q codes are increasingly popular and convenient,

personal information to qualify for the reward. The
recipient then uses
this information to issue a bank account.
Withdrawing the victim's money This is
another form of fraud using malicious qa codes
to redirect users to
fraudulent websites that steal personal information.

in the US to charge vehicles
entering the commercial area at the
heart of the new New York Metropolitan Transportation Authority.
This plan is expected to
start applying from June.
Cars moving into the
Manhattan area during the day will pay a toll of $15.
Large vehicles will pay a
minimum toll of $24.  During the day, the fee will be
lower than at night, with taxis
charging a surcharge of $1.25 for all rides, and
ride-hailing apps like Uber will charge a surcharge of
$2.50. New York has
high levels of traffic congestion.  than any other in the United States. It
took us five years to develop the
plan and to pass it.
Proponents say the tolls
will encourage public transportation use,
reduce congestion, and improve public transportation.  Improving the
travel speed of vehicles reduces
air pollution and generates revenue to
improve the transportation system. However,
many people also believe that the toll plan
will put pressure on workers and
increase the price of vehicles.  Food products are still
transported into the city by truck before
New York. Other major cities in the
world such as London, Stockholm,
Sweden, Milan, Italy and Singapore
have imposed fees on
vehicles moving into the city.
According to data from the
country's statistics agency, in 2023 the rate of
marriages between Koreans and foreigners will exceed the number of marriages between
Koreans and foreigners for the first time.
double-digit level since
2010. Last year Korea had 19,700
international marriages and for every 10
married Korean couples, one couple had a
foreign spouse in terms of
gender. Nearly 75 marriages
Multiculturalism is between Korean men and
foreign women. The rest are Korean women
marrying foreign men. In terms of nationality
of foreign spouses,
Vietnam and America top the list of men's ratio.
Koreans marrying Vietnamese women accounts for
the most with nearly 34 minutes, followed by
China, Thailand, Japan, the Philippines
and the United States. The rate of Korean women marrying Americans is
again at the top with nearly 28 minutes, followed by
China, Vietnam, Canada and the United States.
